name: White Twitch  FFZ DARKMODE
description:
Adds more white :p
you should enable  "Gray Chat (no blue)"
only works if you have FFZ and enabled the dark mode
additional_info:
You need to enable dark mode in FFZ (https://www.frankerfacez.com/)
1.x random stuff + speedrunslive tab
1.x added support for most of the stuff from the new dashboard and some other stuff + Automod
1.x added support for the new Twitch Design.

discussions.name: When I enable Theater Mode I get a black screen instead of the stream :-/
